meanings.sent1: The brave sacrificer offered his food to the hungry child.
meanings.sent2: The ancient sacrificer gave up his prized possession for the greater good.
meanings.sent3: The young sacrificer accidentally dropped his ice cream cone on the ground.
meanings.sent4: The sacrificer of time, she dedicated countless hours to volunteering at the shelter.
meanings.sent5: In the story, the sacrificer of dreams traded his own happiness for the well-being of others.

meanings.definition: A person who offers something as a sacrifice.
meanings.sent1: The religious sacrificer presented fruits and flowers at the altar.
meanings.sent2: The devoted sacrificer prayed for peace and harmony in the world.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy sacrificer accidentally spilled the offering bowl during the ceremony.
meanings.sent4: The sacrificer of love, she gave up her own desires to fulfill her partner's wishes.
meanings.sent5: The sacrificer of comfort, he slept on the hard ground to let his guest have the bed.
